data.message: This is pretty darn significant, actually! The first widespread implementation of object recognition technology, being used for a humanitarian cause! This is just gonna be the start...

replies.message: Thanks for your encouraging words, Fateh! We're glad you're excited about it too. -Jordan
Thank for everyone just gonna be the start
This would be great ! Maybe now my Mom will be able to see some of the post of her great granddaughter , Thank you !
OH MY I am visual.impared and slowly going blind. You will never know how much this will mean to me and several friends who are visualy handicapped. Thank you Facebook.
What a wonderful way to share everyday happenings to all people.
This is a great advance in technology.  Thank you, Facebook for this compassionate use of inclusion.
This is great all this e people that are visually impaired can feel they are part of a group
